en.Title: <color=#FFFFFFFF>MAL</color>FUNCTION
en.Tutorial_1:
In this game, your goal is to save the earth from destruction by incoming asteroids!

Use your strategy and mathematical skills to defend your buildings and equipment from the explosive impacts of the deadly asteroids.
en.Tutorial_2:
In order to defend against the asteroids, you can buy rockets, nukes, and shields. You need to spend science points to buy these, and you can earn more science points by correctly answering function questions.

Buying rockets and nukes allows you shoot the asteroids out of the sky before they reach your buildings and equipment. Buying shields gives you extra protection on the ground in case any asteroids escape your rockets and nukes.

If all of your buildings and equipment are destroyed, you lose!
en.Tutorial_3:
For each function question, you are given a function and the input values for the function. Given this information, you must find the output.

For example, if the function is f(x) = 5x + 1, and the input is x = 2, then the output will be 11, which you can calculate by substituting the value of x into the function: (5 × 2) + 1 = 11.
en.Tutorial_4:
As you answer more questions, the difficulty will increase. Eventually you will move from 1 input variable (x) to 2 input variables (x, y) and then 3 input variables (x, y, z).

Multi-variable functions work in the same way as single-variable functions. For example, if the function is f(x, y, z) = 2x + 3y − 4z, and the input is (x, y, z) = (4, 2, 1), then the output will be 10, which you can calculate by substituting the values of x, y, and z into the function: (2 × 4) + (3 × 2) − (4 × 1) = 8 + 6 − 4 = 10.
en.Tutorial_5:
Correct answers will earn you science points. But be careful: incorrect answers will cost you science points!

If you continuously answer questions correctly with no mistakes, you will build up a streak! The higher your streak, the faster your rockets and rocket fire rate. However, as soon as you make a mistake, you will lose your streak, and your rocket speed and fire rate will return to normal.
